title: Implement micronutrient goals and targets in user profile
description:
Users can track micronutrients but can't set targets/goals (e.g., RDA for vitamins).

**What's Needed:**
- Add micronutrient_goals to user_profile table
- Structure: JSON or 21 columns for each micronutrient target
- Default to FDA RDA values
- Allow users to customize per micronutrient

**Implementation:**
- Migration: ALTER TABLE user_profiles ADD COLUMN micronutrient_goals TEXT (JSON)
- Type: MicronutrientGoals (same structure as Micronutrients)
- Storage: save/load goals with user profile
- UI: Settings page to configure targets
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] user_profiles table has micronutrient_goals column
- [ ] MicronutrientGoals type defined
- [ ] Default RDA values populated on profile creation
- [ ] Dashboard shows progress vs goals (not just absolute values)
- [ ] Settings UI allows editing goals
notes: Backend complete but web UI removed in major redesign. Re-evaluate when building new UI.

title: Add authorization to metrics health handler
description:

- Performance metrics exposed
- Database connection details exposed

1. Implement token-based auth (check Authorization header)
2. OR implement IP allowlist (restrict to internal network)
3. OR implement basic auth (username/password)

Must fix before production deployment.
